thread.title: BRIEF-Florida Power & Light Says Announced Names And Locations Of 4 New Solar Power Plants Expected To Begin Powering Customers By Mid-2019​

title: BRIEF-Florida Power & Light Says Announced Names And Locations Of 4 New Solar Power Plants Expected To Begin Powering Customers By Mid-2019​
text: Market News March 2, 2018 / 2:14 PM / in 24 minutes BRIEF-Florida Power & Light Says Announced Names And Locations Of 4 New Solar Power Plants Expected To Begin Powering Customers By Mid-2019​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Nextera Energy Inc: * FLORIDA POWER & LIGHT - ANNOUNCED NAMES AND LOCATIONS OF 4 NEW SOLAR POWER PLANTS EXPECTED TO BEGIN POWERING CUSTOMERS BY MID-2019​ * ‍FLORIDA POWER & LIGHT - FROM 2016 TO 2023, FPL EXPECTS TO INSTALL OVER 10 MILLION SOLAR PANELS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
